item.title: Why I pulled a HULK SMASH on my social media presence
item.description: I’ve had this feeling that the amount of brainspace that social media occupied was out of balance for me.

item.title: My week with Soylent 1.4, or “Oh god I want a burger”
item.description: I tried Soylent. I did not love it.
